title: MKF Crossbody Bag for Women – Shoulde Strap – PU Leather Designer Crossover Lady Handbag Small Messenger Purse
features: Made of high quality faux leather, fabric lining. Designed with luxurious gold tone embellishments and gold tone chain link handle design
Interior features a compartment with slip in pocket and zippered pocket
Removable/adjustable 24 in long shoulder strap, 8 in handle drop and approximate measurements are 7 in L x 9 in H x 2.5 in D
description: These designer handbags are part of the MKF Collection by Mia K., they’re manufactured of high quality faux leather giving it durability for long lasting use. This unique and lovely crossbody shoulder bag has a secure zip top and snap closure to keep your belongings from falling. MKF Collection handbags always keep interesting interiors in the case of our Aisha crossbody shoulder bag the interior features a compartment with slip in pocket and zippered pocket furthermore the exterior features a back zippered pocket and the exterior of the crossbody bag is designed with luxurious gold tone embellishments. Not to mention that this handbag also has a very comfortable chain link handle that measure 8 inches long and a removable/adjustable shoulder strap that adjusts up to 24 inches long giving you the potential to either wear it as a crossbody or as a handbag and shoulder bag. The approximate measurements of this stunning shoulder bag are 7 in L x 9 in H x 2.5 in D. Conveying this gorgeous crossbody bag for women will prompt you instant style no matter where you’re standing!
